sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: at the weekend. After the attack, heavily armed gunmen fled to a monastery, where three of them were killed in a standoff with Kosovo forces. Weapons seized from the monastery siege were put on display hours after the standoff ended. sentences.sentence: But the confrontation, one of the worst incidents between the two wartime foes since Kosovo declared independence from Serbia in 2008, comes after months of EU-led efforts to normalize ties between Serbia and its former province.

Reporting to the World Bodies Human Rights Council in Geneva, the panel said that crimes included torture, sexual violence and deliberate targeting of civilian areas. sentences.sentence: EU member states have reached an agreement that would see the bloc's latest vehicle emissions regulation seriously watered down. Known as Euro 7, the standards compel carmakers to reduce the carbon dioxide they emit in order to fight climate change and improve air quality.

sentences.sentence: EU competitive ministers agreed in Brussels on Monday to a proposal presented by the Spanish EU presidency that essentially sees them bowing to lobbying by the car industry.

sentences.sentence: Countries with big car industries like France, Italy and the Czech Republic were just some of the member states pushing the Council in this direction.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05

sentences.sentence: Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban says his country was deceived by the European Union when they agreed to transport grain out of Ukraine through Hungary after shipments across the Black Sea were blocked by the war. Orban argued that his government opened a solidarity corridor so that Ukraine could transport food to countries in Africa, but that those shipments had instead been sold inside Hungary for lower prices. In Hungary, we have a cheaper price for the land of the Hungarian farmers than our own market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: Together with Poland and Slovakia, we have ordered an import ban on 23 agricultural products from Ukraine. The comments come just days after Ukraine filed a complaint at the World Trade Organization against Hungary, Poland and Slovakia for banning imports of Ukrainian farm products.
